snippet: Robin Sparkman, the editor in chief of The American Lawyer magazine, will lead Brooklyn organization, which records and collects oral histories.
abstract: StoryCorps, Brooklyn public media organization that records and collects oral histories, names its first-ever chief executive, Robin Sparkman, currently editor in chief of The American Lawyer magazine.
lead_paragraph: Robin Sparkman, the editor in chief of The American Lawyer magazine, will lead Brooklyn organization, which records and collects oral histories.
